settings.sub_header: For four generations, we’ve made a name in the seafood industry for our exceptional smoked fish products, global philanthropy, and culinary innovations. But at the end of the day, we’re family. We hope you’ll be a part of it.

settings.header: Come Pass the Passion with Us
settings.sub_header: A family business that treats you like family. If you're going to show up every day, we're committed to showing up for you. Come forge connections in a workplace that truly cares. At Acme, every relationship matters.
We put in the work, but we have fun doing it. That's because we understand that life is all about balance. So, why wait? Find your spot today, and join the most passionate team in smoked fish.

settings.title: Financial Benefits
settings.description: Forge a stronger future with our employee financial benefits, including a 401(k) with a 3% company contribution regardless of what you contribute yourself. Know someone who’s Acme quality? We offer $1,000 for employee referrals.

settings.title: Paid Parental Leave
settings.description: A family business understands at its core that family comes first. Showing up for you means showing up for us, and that's why we invest in generous paid parental leave so that you never have to choose between your work life and home life.

settings.title: Education Assistance
settings.description: Improving is winning. It’s a core value  shared across our team. You can deepen your knowledge using tuition reimbursement and help your dependents deepen theirs with scholarships through the Acme Smoked Fish Foundation.

settings.title: Paid Time Off
settings.description: Balance—it’s not just for the flavor profile of smoked fish. No matter how you choose to spend your days off, we encourage you to take time (and enjoy it!). Count on paid personal and sick days, vacations and holidays.

settings.title: Health and Welfare
settings.description: Your health and wellness matter. With your choice of two comprehensive medical plans, HSA, FSA, dental, vision, group term life, voluntary life, and disability, we’ll keep you—and your family—covered from fin to tail.

settings.body: Tony is the energetic, personable, and knowledgeable backbone of the IT department, consistently going above and beyond to improve systems, assist colleagues, and radiate positivity.
When customer issues arise, Mimi makes them right. Her commitment to the customer is always on full display. Mimi knows, Acme was built on customer service.
Sherine is a pleasant and helpful colleague who excels at building strong, positive relationships with team members and leadership across Acme.
Rafael is highly passionate and dedicated to his work, often working through breaks to ensure boxes are organized, pallets are wrapped, and everyone has the supplies they need.
Julissa has significantly improved the AP department by enhancing processes, meeting timelines, and demonstrating a strong commitment to quality and team development.
Caleb has brought structure, sustainability, and innovation to the packaging process while significantly enhancing the workplace through his passion for improvement, organization, and collaboration.
Sid is fully committed to making Acme more climate-friendly, actively embracing every initiative and seeking new opportunities to reduce the company’s environmental impact.
Andrew is an invaluable, dependable team player who consistently goes above and beyond to support others with care, respect, and dedication.
Jessica defines professionalism, as she consistently exceeds goals, values quality, and is dedicated to delivering the best possible product.
Susan is a dedicated, enthusiastic leader who takes ownership of her work, supports her team, fosters positivity, and goes above and beyond to connect with and uplift everyone around her at Acme.
Mark is a strong advocate for plastic recycling at Acme NC, always communicating about available recyclables and partnering with the recycling company on specialty items.
Richard is a gem, leading the food safety team with confidence, maintaining high standards in quality, and providing invaluable support through his expertise and diligence.
Kim is an exceptionally kind and positive individual who consistently brings warmth and happiness to those around her, even in challenging times.
Willie is a thoughtful, hardworking professional who consistently delivers high-quality results, in a timely manner, driving business success.

settings.description: We’re hungry to learn more, welcoming every day as an opportunity to improve our craft, sharpen our skills, and do better for our community.
We hold ourselves accountable to exceed expectations and deliver the highest quality outcomes across everything that we do.
We're obsessed with bringing passion to the table, celebrating our traditions, and inspiring each other to innovate.
We’re committed to turning the tides against climate change—innovating our practices to craft a sustainable, socially responsible future for our people, our products, and our planet.

From passionate conversations with our coworkers to deli-counter chats with our community, we put our all into every interaction. We’re not just here to craft the best smoked fish—we’re here to craft genuine connections and meaningful experiences.

settings.header: Ready to Join Our Winning Team?

some cool things
We're obsessed with bringing passion to the table, celebrating our traditions, and inspiring each other to innovate.
Of all the many things that I appreciate about working at Acme Smoked Fish, I think that the culture that we’ve built and are continuously building is what separates us from other organizations.

Everyone at Acme is focused on making great products without taking any shortcuts. Leadership makes great efforts to foster collaboration and team work. The Company continues to grow at a very fast pace, which I like.

You have the ability to work directly with the people at top and build great relationships at every level of the company. The ownership and executives are all great people. This company is here to stay as an industry leader and is rapidly growing, even during the hard times.

This job has good pay, and solid benefits. The management is fair and honest. Working at this Brooklyn institution was one of the best jobs I've ever had. If I didn't have to move elsewhere, I would still be there.

Great work environment with amazing people. The management team is super understandable and reasonable and work alongside you. There is room for growth to develop a career, not just a job. An overall family oriented company environment with a great staff!
